Discover.howItWorksDesc: We use Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) combining semantic search with GPT-4. Your query is converted into a vector embedding, matched against our movie database, then GPT-4 analyzes enriched metadata (keywords, cast, crew, themes) to explain why each movie fits your request. This gives you intelligent recommendations with context, not just keyword matching!

MovieDetails.aiDescription: These recommendations are generated using vector similarity search on movie embeddings. The AI compares this movie's themes, plot, and style with our entire database to find the closest matches.

howItWorks.title: ðŸ§  How AI Recommendations Work
howItWorks.step1Desc: Rate movies you have watched. The system focuses on your highly-rated movies (7+ stars) to understand what you love.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Your ratings are converted into a 1536-dimensional "taste vector" using OpenAI embeddings. This captures themes, styles, and vibes you prefer.
howItWorks.step3Desc: We search our database of thousands of movies using vector similarity to find the closest matches to your taste profile.
howItWorks.proTip: ðŸ’¡ Pro tip: The more movies you rate (especially with diverse genres), the better your recommendations become. The system automatically updates your profile whenever you add new ratings!
